TableField.name: InsuranceTypeID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track insurance types utilized throughout the enterprise

TableField.name: InsuranceCategoryID
TableField.phrase: Insurance Category|A short but descriptive phrase used to group similar insurances

CodeField.name: InsuranceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Insurance Category|A short but descriptive phrase used to group similar insurances

TableField.name: InsuranceTypeTitle
TableField.phrase: Type|A short title or phrase used to describe the insurance type

TableField.name: InsuranceTypeDesc
TableField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the insurance type
TableField.sample: Boiler and machinery insurance, sometimes referred to as 'equipment breakdown' or 'mechanical breakdown coverage,' provides coverage for the accidental breakdown of boilers, machinery, and equipment. This type of coverage usually will reimburse you for property damage and business interruption losses. For example, this coverage would cover fire damage to computers.

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: InsuranceType
CombinedField.phrase: Insurance Type|A combined field used to describe this insurance type when associating it with other records

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about the insurance type

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about the insurance type

EditScreen.name: Guidance
EditScreen.phrase: Guidance|Associate guidance with the insurance type

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for the insurance type

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the insurance type

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate physical files and retention methods with the insurance type

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
